name: FoodChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open Food Challenge”
”Alexa, start Food Challenge”
”Alexa, launch Food Challenge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Food Challenge" is an Alexa skill designed to test your knowledge of different foods and cuisines from around the world. The skill will ask you a series of questions, and you will need to respond with a simple "yes" or "no" answer. As you progress through the questions, the skill will keep track of your score and provide feedback on your performance. 
The multiplayer mode supports up to four players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
